promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word name for a gigantic strong mantis grass-type pokemon with a ornate crystal core. It can be found in jungle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or mantis. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Crystantis, a a gigantic strong mantis grass-type pokemon. It can be found in jungle-like environments It has the following abilities: Flog. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "mantis", "grass" or "Crystantis". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, mantis-like, strong, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and teal ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal verdant titan, known as Crystantis, thrives in dense rainforests. Its ability, Flog, grants it powerful strikes, while its refined crystal-like exoskeleton glimmers in the sunlight. It protects its home passionately, embodying the spirit of the jungle.
